ОРГАНИЗАЦИЯ И ВЕДЕНИЕ СЪЕМОК
С МОМЕНТА РОЖДЕНИЯ СЦЕНАРИЯ ДО КОНЕЧНОГО РЕЗУЛЬТАТА

services.title-1: 1. A client orders a private video film
services.title-2: 2. A client orders a corporate video film
services.text-1: A client comes to a «Tasma» media studio to order a video shooting as a present for an important event to his friend.
services.text-2: A client together with a producer come to an agreement and Media studio workers proceed to a video making process.
services.text-3: A client comes to a «Tasma» media studio to order a video content for a presentation of his company at the international conference.
services.text-4: Заказчик обращается в медиа студию «Тасма», чтобы ему изготовили видеоконтент для презентации на международной конференции.
services.list-1: I would like to order a video for my friend’s birthday party. How does the process go?
services.list-2: At first, I think up an individual script, discuss all the details with you. After that, you confirm the script.
services.list-3: I would like to admit that we keep the required level of confidentiality during the whole video process if needed.
services.list-4: The whole video shooting process is approximated to a real filmmaking process, where you can feel yourself as a real movie star.
services.list-12: I would like to order a video content for a conference. How does the process go?
services.list-22: I think up with an individual script of a video film and approve all the technical details that may be used in a film. After that you approve the script itself.
services.list-32: You can be sure that the video content will be done at the time discussed and it will be proper quality.
services.list-42: At the end you will get a high quality video accompaniment of your event, that will perfectly emphasize the main moments of your event.
